verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lamb of God
You take away the sins of the world
Miserere nobis
Miserere nobis
Miserere nobis

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lamb of God
You take away the sins of the world
Miserere nobis
Miserere nobis
Miserere nobis

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lamb of God
You take away the sins of the world
Dona nobis pacem
